shareJob.intro: Are you aware of ideal candidates for this position? Perfect! Use your network, support others in their job search and earn money in the process! Here's how it works:
shareJob.intro.bullet2: Send the link to your friends or share it in your networks
shareJob.intro.bullet3: If the position is successfully filled based on your recommendation, you will receive a bonus of 500 CHF
shareJob.email.info: We need your email address to send you the personal referral link and to notify you when you have earned a reward.
shareJob.email.accept: I have read and agree to the terms of use. *
shareJob.link.instructions: Now share your recommendation link to the job with your friends and networks. We keep our fingers crossed that your recommendation leads to a successful job placement and that we can pay you your bonus.
shareJob.It's your link. Now you just have to sha: It's your link. Now you just have to share it.

termsAndConditions:
We would like to point out that the companies you are now applying to have outsourced parts of the recruitment process to a specialized service provider (digitalent ag, hereinafter referred to as “service provider”). With your application you acknowledge this and agree to it.

For the purpose of handling the recruitment process, the service provider (digitalent ag) collects and processes the personal data of interested parties and applicants. The processing can take place electronically. This is particularly the case if an interested party submits relevant application documents electronically, for example by email or via a web form on the website. In the case of an application, the service provider transmits the following data to the company:


  • Email address
  • Contact details
  • First Name, Last Name
  • possibly CV
  • possibly testimonials
  • All of the data you have provided yourself for this purpose, such as the specified qualifications, work experience, preferences, etc.

If the company concludes an employment contract with an applicant, the transmitted data will be stored for the purpose of processing the employment relationship in compliance with the statutory provisions. If no employment contract is concluded between the company and the applicant, the application documents will be deleted six months after notification of the rejection decision, provided that deletion does not conflict with any other legitimate interests or contractual obligations. In addition, the data protection provisions of the service provider apply.

meta.title: Jobs that suit you
meta.description: Are you looking for new challenges, exciting employers and career opportunities? Here you will find current jobs in the fields of recruiting, HR, IT, marketing and many other sectors. Browse through our vacancies, simply apply online and get started - with personal support from digitalent!
